other_tests.findings: Prolonged P-100 latency at 149 milliseconds on the left side and 115 milliseconds on the right side.
Elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate level of 105 mm/h and elevated IgG level of 7,690 mg/dL with serum immunofixation electrophoresis demonstrating IgG monoclonal protein.
Diffuse plasma cell infiltration accounting for 50% of total nucleated cells.
Demyelination with aggregates of reactive astrocytes and perivascular lymphohistiocytic infiltration; intact axons on neurofilament immunostain.
CSF cell count was 2/mmÂ³ with elevated protein level of 97 mg/dL and a detectable CSF oligoclonal band identical to the serum protein band.
Widespread giant and polyphasic motor unit potentials, with fibrillation and fasciculation potentials in all four limbs.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Acute denervation potentials disappeared after cessation of pesticide use.

other_tests.findings: Prolonged central conduction time on the left side (26.4 milliseconds) with normal right side.
Increased levels of 3-methylglutaconic acid (108.1), 3-methylglutaric acid (12.8), and 3-hydroxyisovaleric acid (15.2), indicating a suspicion for MGA1.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Neurologic status unchanged during follow-up for 1 year after diagnosis.
